trans-unit.source: Provides an interface that enables a designer to access and filter the dictionaries of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> that stores the property, attribute, and event descriptors that a component designer can expose to the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 提供的介面，可讓設計工具來存取和篩選的字典<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>儲存元件設計工具可以公開 （expose） 至設計階段環境的屬性、 屬性和事件描述元。

trans-unit.source: IDesignerFilter enables a designer to filter the set of property, attribute, and event descriptors that its associated component exposes through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: IDesignerFilter 可讓設計工具來篩選透過<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>公開其相關聯的元件的屬性、 屬性和事件描述元組

trans-unit.source: The methods of this interface whose names begin with `Pre` are called immediately before the methods whose names begin with `Post`.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面的方法名稱開頭為`Pre`稱為名稱開頭為方法之前立即`Post`。

trans-unit.source: If you want to add attribute, event, or property descriptors, use a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterAttributes%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterEvents%2A>, or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要加入屬性、 事件或屬性描述項，使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterAttributes%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterEvents%2A>，或<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterEvents%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change or remove attribute, event, or property descriptors, use a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterAttributes%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterEvents%2A>, or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更或移除屬性、 事件或屬性描述元，使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterAttributes%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterEvents%2A>，或<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterProperties%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterEvents%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of attributes that it exposes through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，可讓設計工具來變更或移除的項目會透過公開的屬性集的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method provides a way to change or remove items within the dictionary of attributes that the associated component of the designer implementing this interface exposes through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來變更或移除字典中的屬性會實作這個介面設計工具關聯的元件公開透過<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>項目

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the type IDs of the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的字典中的索引鍵是屬性的類型識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The objects are of type <xref:System.Attribute>.
trans-unit.target: 物件是類型<xref:System.Attribute>.</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: This method is called immediately after <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterAttributes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterAttributes%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterAttributes%2A>之後，立即呼叫此方法

trans-unit.source: The type ID of an attribute can be any object.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的型別 ID 可以是任何物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Attribute> returns its <xref:System.Type> as the value of its <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Attribute>傳回其<xref:System.Type>的值作為其<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: You can check the <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> of an attribute in the dictionary for equivalence with a known <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> for an attribute to identify it, or use <xref:System.Reflection> to identify the attribute object itself.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢查<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A>等價與已知的字典中的屬性<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A>屬性來識別它，或使用<xref:System.Reflection>識別本身的屬性物件。</xref:System.Reflection> </xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> </xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A>

trans-unit.source: When an attribute that has the same <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> as an existing or inherited attribute is added to a component, the new attribute replaces the old attribute.
trans-unit.target: 當屬性具有相同<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A>將元件加入現有或繼承的屬性，新的屬性會取代舊的屬性。</xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A>

trans-unit.source: For many attributes, a new attribute of the same type will replace any previous attribute of the type.
trans-unit.target: 對於許多屬性，相同類型的新屬性將會取代任何先前屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: However, some types of attributes return a <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> that distinguishes the attribute selectively.
trans-unit.target: 不過，某些類型的屬性傳回<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A>，選擇性地區分屬性。</xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, in order to provide different types of simultaneously active designers for a type, such as an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> and an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> class returns a <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> that uniquely identifies both the attribute and the base designer type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要提供不同類型的同時作用中的設計工具對於類型，例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>、<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>類別會傳回<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A>可唯一識別的屬性和基底設計工具的型別。</xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> constructor allows you to specify the base designer type of the designer in addition to its specific type, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> returns a <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> that reflects this.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>建構函式可讓您指定特定的類型，除了在設計工具的基底設計工具的型別和<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>傳回<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A>，以反映這。</xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Therefore when you add a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> with a base designer type of the same type as the base designer type of an existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>, the old attribute is replaced with the new attribute.
trans-unit.target: 因此當您新增新<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>與設計工具的基底類型，針對現有的基底設計工具的型別相同型別的<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>，舊的屬性會取代新的屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Attribute> objects for the class of the component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Attribute>元件的類別的物件。</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId*> values of the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的字典中索引鍵是<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId*>屬性的值。</xref:System.Attribute.TypeId*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of events that it exposes through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，可讓設計工具來變更或移除的項目會透過公開的事件集的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method provides a way to change or remove items within the dictionary of events that are exposed through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來變更或移除字典中的公開會透過<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>事件的項目

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of events are the names of the events.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件字典的索引鍵是事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The objects are of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 物件是類型<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: This method is called immediately after <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterEvents%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterEvents%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterEvents%2A>之後，立即呼叫此方法

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> objects that represent the events of the class of the component.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref>物件，代表此元件類別的事件。

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of events are event names.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件字典的索引鍵是事件名稱。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of properties that it exposes through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，可讓設計工具來變更或移除項目從一組屬性，它會公開透過<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method provides a way to change or remove items within the dictionary of properties that are exposed through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來變更或移除字典中的公開會透過<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>屬性的項目

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of properties are the names of the properties.
trans-unit.target: 屬性字典中的索引鍵是屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The objects are of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 物件是類型<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: This method is called immediately after <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterProperties%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterProperties%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterProperties%2A>之後，立即呼叫此方法

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects that represent the properties of the class of the component.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>代表之屬性的元件類別的物件。

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of properties are property names.
trans-unit.target: 屬性字典中的索引鍵是屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to add items to the set of attributes that it exposes through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，可讓設計工具將項目會透過公開的屬性集的加入<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method provides a way to add items to the dictionary of attributes that the associated component of the designer implementing this interface exposes through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來將項目加入至實作這個介面設計工具關聯的元件公開<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>透過屬性字典

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the type IDs of the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的字典中的索引鍵是屬性的類型識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The objects are of type <xref:System.Attribute>.
trans-unit.target: 物件是類型<xref:System.Attribute>.</xref:System.Attribute>
